full_text: FYI >>> (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @nysd.uscourts.gov> 8/12/2019 2:42 PM >>> (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) please thank the Warden for his prompt response to my letter. Richard M. Berman On Aug 12, 2019, at 2:37 PM, Christine Murray (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @nysd.uscourts.gov> wrote: fyi ----- Forwarded by Christine Murray/NYSD/02/USCOURTS on 08/12/2019 02:37 PM ----- From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) To: "Lamine NDiaye" (b)(6) @bop.gov> Cc: (b)(6) @att.net>, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @nysd.uscourts.gov>, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov>, "Michael Greco" (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @nysd.uscourts.gov>, (b)(6) Date: 08/12/2019 02:33 PM Subject: Re: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490 Good afternoon, Attached please find Warden N'Diaye's response to Your Honor's inquiry. Please let us know if you need further information. Thank you, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Supervisory Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, New York 10007 p: (646)836-(b)(6) f: (646)836-7665 >>> <BermanNYSDChambers@nysd.uscourts.gov> 8/12/2019 12:47 PM >>> Please see attached letter from Judge Richard M. Berman. (See attached file: Aug 12 letter.pdf)(See attached file: 2019_08_12_14_31_06.pdf) <2019_08_12-14_31_06.pdf>

text_blocks.content: (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) please thank the Warden for his prompt response to my letter. Richard M. Berman
On Aug 12, 2019, at 2:37 PM, Christine Murray (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @nysd.uscourts.gov> wrote:
fyi ----- Forwarded by Christine Murray/NYSD/02/USCOURTS on 08/12/2019 02:37 PM -----

From: (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) To: "Lamine NDiaye" (b)(6) @bop.gov> Cc: (b)(6) @att.net>, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @nysd.uscourts.gov>, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov>, "Michael Greco" (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @nysd.uscourts.gov>, (b)(6) Date: 08/12/2019 02:33 PM Subject: Re: Jeffrey Epstein 19 cr 490
Good afternoon, Attached please find Warden N'Diaye's response to Your Honor's inquiry. Please let us know if you need further information. Thank you, (b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
Supervisory Staff Attorney CLC New York Metropolitan Correctional Center 150 Park Row New York, New York 10007 p: (646)836-(b)(6) f: (646)836-7665
Please see attached letter from Judge Richard M. Berman. (See attached file: Aug 12 letter.pdf)(See attached file: 2019_08_12_14_31_06.pdf) <2019_08_12-14_31_06.pdf>

additional_notes: The document is an email chain with redactions. The email chain discusses a response from Warden N'Diaye regarding Jeffrey Epstein's case.
